sentences.en: And they will have to strengthen the IMF as their ultimate safeguard.
sentences.cn: 他们还必须巩固国际货币基金组织,作为他们最后的保障.

sentences.en: Any experience can teach and strengthen you, but particularly the more difficult ones.
sentences.cn: 任何经历都能使你从中受益并让你变得坚强，而那些比较艰难的经历尤其如此。

sentences.en: Both these facts strengthen the case against hanging.
sentences.cn: 这两项事实使反对绞刑的理由更加充分。

sentences.en: Community leaders want to strengthen controls at external frontiers.
sentences.cn: 社区领导想要加强对小区外围的管理。

sentences.en: Hiram died, and the help of Tyre ceased to strengthen Jerusalem.
sentences.cn: 希兰死了, 而推罗的帮助再也无法加强耶路撒冷的力量.

sentences.en: His visit is intended to strengthen ties between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 他此次访问旨在增进两国间的关系。

sentences.en: I am also looking urgently at how we can strengthen the law.
sentences.cn: 我也在急切地关注我们该如何加强法制。

sentences.en: In a strange way, his affair caused our relationship to strengthen.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的是，他的婚外恋倒使我们之间的关系更加紧密了。

sentences.en: In theory, everyone agrees that we need to strengthen and open up these institutions.
sentences.cn: 在理论上，每个人都同意我们需要加强和开放这些组织机构。

sentences.en: It will draw you closer together, and it will strengthen the bond of your relationship.
sentences.cn: 这将使你们走得更近，并将增进你们之间的关系。

sentences.en: Our friendship has steadily strengthened over the years.
sentences.cn: 我们的友谊逐年加深。

sentences.en: Steve’s opposition only strengthened her resolve to go ahead.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫的反对反而坚定了她继续下去的决心。

sentences.en: Stones whet a sword, difficulties strengthen willpower.
sentences.cn: 石头是刀的朋友, 障碍是意志的朋友.

sentences.en: The builders will have to strengthen the existing joists with additional timber.
sentences.cn: 施工人员将不得不另外用木料加固现有的托梁。

sentences.en: The company plans to strengthen its hand (= make itself more powerful ) in Europe by opening an office in Spain.
sentences.cn: 该公司计划在西班牙设立办事处，以此增强在欧洲的实力。

sentences.en: The need to strengthen the family has been a recurrent theme for the Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 巩固家庭关系是首相屡次谈到的话题。

sentences.en: This plywood addition helps to strengthen the structure.
sentences.cn: 多层胶合板有助于加固结构。

sentences.en: We must strengthen our unity in the face of powerful enemies.
sentences.cn: 大敌当前,我们必须加强团结.

sentences.en: We should do something together at weekends so as to strengthen our relationship.
sentences.cn: 为了巩固我们的感情，我们应该在周末一起做一些事情。

sentences.en: Yoga can be used to strengthen the immune system.
sentences.cn: 瑜伽能增强人体免疫系统。

words.tran_cn: 坚强的；强壮的；牢固的；擅长的
强有力地；坚强地；激烈地；气味浓地
加强,修复,使强壮,使坚固,支持

phrases.tran_cn: 使做事更强硬；使行动更有力

trans.tran_en: to become stronger or make something stronger

trans.tran_cn: 巩固，支持，壮大，加强，使坚定，增强
trans.tran_en: to become stronger or make something stronger
to become stronger or make something stronger
to become stronger or make something stronger
